name: Crystal Pieces
description:
Developed by Diego Faria for Course #4 in MSU's videogame design and development especialization.

The modifications I did are the following:

1. There are holes and the player dies if falls there.

2. Level 1 was modified and added new level 2.

3. Changed the main mechanic of the game. Now the idea is to getthe amount of crystal pieces shown on display and then get the crystal.
